name: SANG GURU: FROM DARKNESS TO LIGHT (On Going Project)
name_original: SANG GURU: FROM DARKNESS TO LIGHT (On Going Project)
description:
Sang Guru: From Darkness To Light is an escort mission game to save the lost souls and bring them to the light.

Play as Sang Guru (The Teacher) in a mission to save the lost souls and guide them from the darkness to the light. Those souls then will become your pupils who will follow your steps and assist you in your journey. Be careful with the devils lurking around your way. They will snatch the souls that you are trying to guide.

Once your life span has finished, you will pass away and one of your pupils will replace you in carrying on the mission and become the new Guru.
